properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING
   5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. 24 AND 25 OCT ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      06-14.77N 048-51.78W AND 04-49.22N 050-06.73W.
   B. 26 AND 27 OCT ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      06-11.20N 048-47.70W AND 04-44.12N 050-03.73W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2451/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 28 OCT 12.
